Articles.Content:
I'm a soon-to-be physics student, who's been wanting KSP for ages! Always loved rocketry, and only just got a laptop capable of running it. Only built a few (inefficient) rockets, but getting better. In my last attempt, I made it to the mun, but ran out of fuel about 2k above the surface D:

I'm holding off from downloading mechjeb until ive proven to myself i can do a completely manual mun landing (possibly even a return if my kerbals are lucky)

Hi bisto, welcome to the community

Good luck on your Munar landings and returns, experimentation is the key, and it's fun too

Also it's good to see another manual pilot
